original_title: となりの銀行員 ノーパン勤務 城山若菜
overview: Wakana Shiroyama, a current bank employee. Her daily life at the bank is a series of ridiculous words such as "She is currently working at the bank with no panties" and "Before that, she was working with a remote control vibrator inserted". I heard that she had a master, and that she would be punished if she did something wrong, so she was a meat slave who faithfully followed orders. The obscene daily life of a de M banker who decided to appear in AV at the order of her master.
title: The Bank Teller from Next Door Is Going to Work Without Her Panties on Wakana Shiroyama
